commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas26917cb"

diff:
"26917cb Bug 391411 - "Update sv-SE files for DOM Inspector" [p=hasse@jasajudeju.se (Hasse) r=slicedlime@gmail.com (Mikael Hedberg) rs=sdwilsh]
